name: Way of the Blaze
desc: Your magic is roiling flame, spreading to foes and fields alike and creating a blazing conflagration.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline provides the basic abilities require to make use of various _Blaze_ Discipline abilities. In general, _Blaze_ abilities revolve around _Fire_ Damage and the _Alight_ condition, as well as _Blazing_ Terrain.

name: Way of the Detonation
desc: MAKE EXPLOSIVE FLAMES A SPECIAL ATTACK. Your magic is a barely contained explosion, straining against your control before it erupts in a devastating blast.
mechanics_desc: Detonation abilities forgo the continuous damage of _Alight_ in favor of more immediate damage. These abilities tend to focus on high-damage, terrain destruction, and powerful area effects.

name: Way of the Gale
desc: Your magic is the wind itself, creating disorienting vortices and lifting tailwinds alike.
mechanics_desc: Gale abilities focus less on direct damage and more on supporting allies, either by disorienting foes and inflicting _Stun_, moving allies with gusts of wind, or providing advantageous terrain to block ranged attacks or allow allies to jump higher.

name: Way of the Land
desc: Your magic is the earth itself, forming it into a fortress and removing the footing from beneath foe's feet.
mechanics_desc: Land abilities focus heavily on sculpting the battlefield, either by creating powerful obstacles to provide allies cover or making the earth itself betray foes, stealing solid footing from them. These abilities tend to lack direct damage, but create the sturdiest and hardest to remove obstacles and terrain.

name: Way of the Mountain
desc: Your magic reaches into stone, propelling it with force or controlling it with fine precision, allowing you to seize weapons from across the field.
mechanics_desc: Mountain abilities specialize in controlling and manipulating stone. When there is an abundance of _Earthen_ Obstacles or Stone Weapons these abilities can make great use of them, using Obstacles for powerful _Earthbend_ abilities and _Puppeting_ equipment.

name: Way of the Storm
desc: Your magic is the storm, with every motion building a charge that is unleashed in a crackling bolt of electricity.
mechanics_desc: Storm abilities specialize in attacking with _Lighting_ and inflicting _Shocked_. These abilities tend to be extremely accurate, and many Disciplines will provide specialized _Charged_ effects that will enhance the next _Lighting_ attack made.

name: Way of the Tide
desc: Your magic is the tide itself, pushing and pulling with unstoppable force.
mechanics_desc: Tide abilities have the greatest potential among Water abilities to manipulate _Watersource_s. Their attacks tend to be low-damage and control-based, but can easily enable other play styles with _Wet_ terrain and powerful aquatic defensive options.

name: Way of the Tundra
desc: Your magic is that of cold and winter, freezing water to turn every battlefield into a barren tundra.
mechanics_desc: Tundra abilities can create a wide range of fragile terrain and obstacles that tend to be extremely punishing towards foes. Additionally, with the ability to inflict _Frozen_ with most attacks, these abilities can limit foe's mobility in a variety of ways.

name: Way of the Acrobat
desc: You flip and twist across the field, vaulting over hazards and rolling through foes.
mechanics_desc: This Mastery focuses on mobility. _Leaping_ Movement allows you to easily avoid Terrain and go up escalation while _Tumble_ allows you to easily disengage from foes and move through their spaces. It broadly expands a characters movement options, making it far easier to cover ground on the battlefield.

name: Way of the Brawler
desc: You excel at up-close combat, grabbing a foe and systematically locking down their movement.

name: Way of the Charger
desc: You are a warrior who puts their head down and rushes headfirst into problems, smashing through everyone and everything in your way.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline focuses on aggressive mobility, providing the ability to move through occupied spaces while making Attacks against the occupants.

name: Way of the Commander
desc: You are a commanding presence on the battlefield, inspiring your allies to fight harder and push through all afflictions.

name: Way of the Great Weapon
desc: You specialize in heavy weapons and can use them flexibly, striking with every part of the weapon and using its weight to strike out at multiple foes.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline is a mastery of heavy weapons, .

name: Way of the Fortress
desc: You are a defensive presence on the battlefield, defending allies from attacks and removing them from harm's way.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline focuses on defending nearby allies, both by using _Intercept_ to protect them and _Swap_ to keep them out of harm's way. Additionally, _Raise Guard_ allows you to set up a fortified position, more easily defending allies and keeping yourself alive.

name: Way of the Scoundrel
desc: You excel at dirty combat, keeping foes off-balance and using every advantage at your disposal.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline focuses on harassing enemies and using abilities to make enemies easier to assault.

name: Way of the Conqueror
desc: Your words and deeds on the battlefield unsettle foes, distracting them and granting your allies openings.

name: Way of the Instigator
desc: You are an infuriating foe, taunting and belittling foes to draw their attention.

name: Way of the Sage
desc: You are a calming presence on the battlefield, keeping your allies from overextending or being blinded by circumstance.

name: Way of the Skulker
desc: You slide through the shadows, avoiding notice on the battlefield.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline revolves around the _Stealthy_ condition, which provides exceptional defenses if you can maintain the proper positioning.

name: Way of the Sniper
desc: You are most at home at extreme ranges, landing devastating shots from a distance.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline enables any character that wishes to use Ranged attacks. By delaying the result of an Attack these characters can overcome many of the typical problems with Ranged attacks and deal heavy single-target damage.

name: Way of the Tactician
desc: You are adept at adapting to any situation, providing allies advantages with every strike.

name: Way of the Twin Weapons
desc: You fight best with a weapon in either hand, making a constant series of strikes.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline allows you to effectively turn _Major Attacks_ into _Minor Attacks_ while dual-wielding, allowing you to easily swap between _Major Attacks_ that deal heavy damage and lighter attacks to defeat smaller foes.

name: Way of the Martial Artist
desc: You are an expert at unarmed combat, unleashing a series of specialized strikes to disorient foes.

name: Way of the Warden
desc: You are a living obstruction, stopping the movement of foes and defending those behind you.
mechanics_desc: This Discipline centers on the _Engaged_ condition
